CustomField.description: This field is used unique identifier to archive old Investor Positions. This field is updated with record ID "PSG Deactivated Investment Vehicle" and been used in sharing rule to ensure only system admin have access to the old investor position.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Copy and Paste Investment Vehicle Name here before you change it to " OLD INACTIVE VEHICLE"Do not delete" field
CustomField.label: Old Inactive Vehicle Name
